lead_paragraph: Richie Sexson hit a run-scoring single in his first at-bat, Alex Rodriguez smacked three hits, and Mike Mussina improved to 12-6 in a victory over the Oakland Athletics.
snippet: Richie Sexson hit a run-scoring single in his first at-bat, Alex Rodriguez smacked three hits, and Mike Mussina improved to 12-6 in a victory over the Oakland Athletics.
